5 + 5 = 10
10 + 5 = 15
99999999999999999 * 99999999999999999 = 1.0E+34
1.0E+34 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+51
1.0E+51 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+68
1.0E+68 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+85
1.0E+85 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+102
1.0E+102 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+119
1.0E+119 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999999E+135
9.999999999999999E+135 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+153
1.0E+153 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999999E+169
9.999999999999999E+169 * 1.0E+17 = 1.0E+187
1.0E+187 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999998E+203
9.999999999999998E+203 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999998E+220
9.999999999999998E+220 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999999E+237
9.999999999999999E+237 * 1.0E+17 = 9.999999999999998E+254
